DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare three CE-marked daily disposable contact lenses tear film stability measure pre-lens non-invasive keratograph break time ( PL NIK-BUT ) . Secondarily , contact lens surface wettability assess .
DOC.brief_title: Subjective Comparison Pre-Lens Tear Film Stability With Daily Disposable Contact Lenses
DOC.detailed_description: Each participant wear 3 brand contact lens randomize , cross-over fashion , washout phase least 1 night brand .
DOC.criteria: Sign Informed Consent . Adapted soft contact lens wearer . Willing wear contact lenses 12 hour attend study visit . Vision correctable 0.1 ( logMAR ) good eye distance prestudy lenses Visit 1 . Contact lens prescription within power range specify protocol . Other protocoldefined inclusion criterion may apply . Any ocular infection , inflammation , abnormality , active disease would contraindicate contact lens wear . Any use systemic ocular medication would contraindicate contact lens wear . Any ocular finding observe Visit 1 examination would contraindicate contact lens wear . Monocular ( 1 eye functional vision ) fit 1 lens . History herpetic keratitis , ocular surgery , irregular cornea . Known pregnancy . Unstable tear film NIKBUT value 13 second either eye without lens . Participation clinical study within 30 day Visit 1 . Other protocoldefined exclusion criterion may apply .
